fields.infoText: Enter your details exactly as they are registered with your business.

fields.label: Telephone number

fields.label: Status within the business

fields.label: Return period end date

fields.infoText: This band applies to journeys travelled over a distance of 0-2000 miles from London

fields.label: Have any chargeable aircraft at lower band A flown in this period?
fields.helpText: This rate applies to the lowest class of travel available and is charged at £13 per passenger

fields.label: Have any chargeable aircraft at standard band A flown in this period?
fields.helpText: This rate applies to any other class of travel and is charged at £26 per passenger

fields.label: Have any chargeable aircraft at higher band A flown in this period?
fields.helpText: This rate applies to travel in aircraft of 20 tonnes or more, equipped to carry fewer than 19 passengers and is charged at £78 per passenger

fields.infoText: This band applies to journeys travelled over a distance of more than 2000 miles from London

fields.label: Have any chargeable aircraft at lower band B flown in this period?
fields.helpText: This rate applies to the lowest class of travel available and is charged at £78 per passenger

fields.label: Have any chargeable aircraft at standard band B flown in this period?
fields.helpText: This rate applies to any other class of travel and is charged at £156 per passenger

fields.label: Have any chargeable aircraft at higher band B flown in this period?
fields.helpText: This rate applies to travel in aircraft of 20 tonnes or more, equipped to carry fewer than 19 passengers and is charged at £468 per passenger

sections.title: Chargeable aircraft flown at lower band A

fields.infoText:
Band A rates apply to journeys travelled over a distance of 0-2000 miles from London.

This rate applies to travel in the lowest class of travel and is charged at £13 per passenger.

sections.title: Chargeable aircraft flown at standard band A

fields.infoText:
Band A rates apply to journeys travelled over a distance of 0-2000 miles from London.

This rate applies to travel in any class (except the lowest) and is charged at £26 per passenger.

sections.title: Chargeable aircraft flown at higher band A

fields.infoText:
Band A rates apply to journeys travelled over a distance of 0-2000 miles from London.

This rate applies to travel in aircraft of 20 tonnes or more, equipped to carry fewer that 19 passengers and is charged at £78 per passenger.

sections.title: Chargeable aircraft flown at lower band B

fields.infoText:
Band B rates apply to journeys travelled over a distance of 2000 miles from London.

This rate applies to travel in the lowest class of travel and is charged at £78 per passenger.

fields.label: Number of chargeable passengers
fields.errorMessage: Number of chargeable passengers must only include whole numbers

sections.title: Chargeable aircraft flown at standard band B

fields.infoText:
Band B rates apply to journeys travelled over a distance of 2000 miles from London.

This rate applies to travel in any class (except the lowest) and is charged at £156 per passenger.

sections.title: Chargeable aircraft flown at higher band B

fields.infoText:
Band B rates apply to journeys travelled over a distance of 2000 miles from London.

This rate applies to travel in aircraft of 20 tonnes or more, equipped to carry fewer that 19 passengers and is charged at £468 per passenger.

fields.label: Under-declarations
fields.helpText:
Under-declarations are made if you have paid too little air passenger duty on your previous return.

 Enter a number between 0 and 50,000

fields.label: Over-declarations
fields.helpText:
Over-declarations are made if you have paid too much air passenger duty on your previous return.

 Avoid overpayments by entering the amount correctly. Enter 0 if you do not wish to make an over-declaration
fields.error message: Over-declarations must be input as either a negative amount or zero

fields.label: Total net declarations
fields.error message: Over-declarations must be input as either a negative amount or zero

fields.label: How many of the passengers you carried are exempt?
Are you using a special  accounting scheme?
Total number of passengers flown, including exempt
fields.value: ${lowerAPassengerNumber + standardAPassengerNumber + higherAPassengerNumber + lowerBPassengerNumber + standardBPassengerNumber + higherBPassengerNumber + exempt}

fields.label: Total amount payable
fields.helpText: Value is total amount of duty plus total declarations
fields.value: ${totalNetDecs + amountpayable1 + amountpayable2 + amountpayable3 + amountpayable4 + amountpayable5 + amountpayable6}
